title: Define System Requirements
description: Gather and document the system requirements needed for a translation platform that caters to businesses and organizations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the system architecture, including frontend, backend and database components.

title: Develop Frontend Components
description: Design and implement the user interface for the translation platform.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Create the necessary backend services for managing translations, user authentication, and data storage.

title: Set Up Database Schema
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing translation data and user information.

title: Implement DevOps Infrastructure
description: Set up the development, testing and deployment infrastructure for the translation platform.

title: Write Functional Requirements Document
description: Document the functional requirements for each component of the translation platform.

title: Review Functional Requirements Document
description: Review and provide feedback on the functional requirements document.

title: Test System Components
description: Perform functional and non-functional testing on each component of the translation platform.

title: Secure the Translation System
description: Review and improve the security measures implemented in the translation platform.
